page.title: 16ENTERTAINMENT:WOKINGHAM
page.content: {THE ST SEBASTIAN WOKINGHAM BRASS BAND was formed in 1931 by a local postman and the Vicar of the parish. Today some thirty{amateur musicians}rehearse twice a week in the Parish room. Instruments, music and uniforms have been provided over the years by funds from members and music played for nominal fees at local fetes and parades. Recently funds and assets have been improved by{sponsorship}from a local building contractor. Links have been formed with the Friesheim Band in{Erfstadt, Wokingham's twin {town}and exchange visits made, players and friends staying in each other's homes. Joint{concerts}have been performed. Officers on the committee who run the business and organisation are the Chairman, Musical Director, Bandmaster, Secretary and Treasurer. The Parish Vicar is President.
